videos.title: How to use pills to filter in the Azure Portal | Azure Portal Series
videos.desc: In this video you would learn about the new design for pills, how to use them when filtering resources, and how to add and edit pill filters.

videos.title: How to get a visualization view of your resources
videos.desc: In this video you would learn how to easily view a summary of your resources using different visualizations such as how to view all your resources on a map

videos.title: How to use Azure Cost Management views
videos.desc: In this video you would  learn about built-in cost views in #Microsoft Azure Cost Management and how to create your own custom views.
